00007 using PWAS.Model;
00008 using System.Reflection;
00009 using System.Collections.ObjectModel;
00010 using System.Data.Linq.Mapping;
00011 
00012 namespace PWAS.DataAccess.SQLRepositories
00013 {
00014     public class Repository<T> : IRepository<T> where T : class
00015     {
00016         private Table<T> itemsTable;
00017 
00018         public Repository(string connectionString)
00019         {
00020             itemsTable = new PWASDataContext(connectionString).GetTable<T>();
00021         }
00022 
00023         #region IRepository<T> Members
00024 
00025         public IQueryable<T> Items
00026         {
00027             get { return itemsTable.AsQueryable<T>(); }
00028         }
00029 
00030         public void AddItem(T item)
00031         {
00032             itemsTable.InsertOnSubmit(item);
00033         }
00034 
00035         public void DeleteItem(int id)
00036         {
00037             DeleteItem(GetById(id));
00038         }
00039 
00040         public void DeleteItem(T item)
00041         {
00042             itemsTable.DeleteOnSubmit(item);
00043         }
00044 
00045         public T GetById(int id)
00046         {
00047             MetaModel modelMap = itemsTable.Context.Mapping;
00048 
00049             // get the data members for this type
00050             ReadOnlyCollection<MetaDataMember> dataMembers = modelMap.GetMetaType(typeof(T)).DataMembers;
00051 
00052             // find the primary key field name
00053             // by checking for IsPrimaryKey
00054             string pk = (dataMembers.Single<MetaDataMember>(m => m.IsPrimaryKey)).Name;
00055 
00056             // return a single object where the id argument
00057             // matches the primary key field value
00058             return itemsTable.SingleOrDefault(i => i.GetType().GetProperty(pk).GetValue(i, null).ToString() == id.ToString());
00059         }
00060 
00061         public void SubmitChanges()
00062         {
00063             itemsTable.Context.SubmitChanges();
00064         }
00065 
00066         #endregion
00067     }
00068 }
